title: "Fasanara Capital Raises €250 Million Fintech Fund, Backed by the European Investment Fund"
excerpt: "Fasanara Capital has closed on a €250 Million Fintech Fund that was supported by the European Investment Fund (EIF) that made a 'cornerstone' investment in the fund. Fasanara Capital is a boutique alternative asset manager and an investor in Fintech lending in Europe."
